name: Charlie Puth Live in Dhaka
description: You just want attention, you don't want my heart, Maybe you just hate the thought of me with someone new, Yeah, you just want attention, I knew from the start, You're just making sure I'm never gettin' over you

name: Let's Vibe Dhaka With Anuv Jain
description: Toote Makan, Ik Baar Gir Kar Waise Bante Kahan Hai, Jaise The Tune Apne Dil Se Banaye, O Karigar YunHathon Se The Sajaye

name: Summer Music Festival
description: Join us for a weekend of live music in the heart of New York City's Central Park. Top artists and a festive atmosphere await!

name: Shakespeare in the Park
description: Experience Shakespeare's timeless classics under the stars at the renowned Delacorte Theater in Central Park.

name: International Film Festival
description: Explore a world of cinema at the Cannes International Film Festival, featuring a lineup of international films and premieres.

name: Stand-Up Comedy Night
description: Get ready to laugh the night away with some of the funniest comedians in the industry at the Laugh Factory.

name: World Cup Soccer Match
description: Don't miss the epic showdown between two soccer giants at the legendary Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro.

name: Magic Extravaganza
description: Be amazed by an evening of enchanting magic tricks, illusions, and mind-boggling feats at the Magic Palace.

name: Corporate Leadership Summit
description: Join industry leaders and visionaries at the Corporate Leadership Summit to explore the future of business and leadership.
